title: Pokemon Sword & Shield Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.13.19
description:
To get 10% off AND free shipping, go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box!

Gary Whitta and Greg talk Pokemon reviews, Death Stranding numbers, and Stadia woes. 

Time Stamps - 
00:07:28 - Housekeeping
New KF Merch! This crewneck sweatshirt and a coffee mug! kindafunny.com/store
Thursday’s schedule is nuts:9am-ish: KFGD,10am: Kinda Funny Screencast on Disney+,Noon: Inside Xbox Watch-a-long,2pm: Gamescast
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Zack Parsley, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:23 - Pokemon Sword & Shield Review Round-Up
00:14:50 Riot Goes Woof!- Do you think reviewers are giving the game a pass on some things others would get docked for simply because it's Pokemon, or was the fan outrage making things seem worse than they actually were? - Best Friends Qs
00:33:30 - Bethesda Gets Human Head
00:31:37 - Death Stranding the BIGGEST new IP Launch in Japan in a while, Game Data Library on Twitter
00:35:50 - Grid on Stadia’s 40 Cars couldn’t happen anywhere else, Alessio Palumbo @ WCCFTECH
00:50:27 -  BROOKLINEN
00:51:50 - MANSCAPED
00:53:55 - ESCAPE THE INVASION
00:55:22 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:56:48 - An online retailer that goes by ShopTo presumably leaked the release date to Dreams this morning with the artwork of the game. The release date on the tweet is February 14th, 2020 which would have been a week before TLOU2's original date. My question is, is this release date real? - Fendyy
00:59:05 - REQUIRED READING:
Dept. of Veterans Affairs believes games can help soldiers reconnect, reduce suicides. Here’s how. - Alex Andrejev @ the Washington Post
https://www.washingtonpost.com/video-games/2019/11/11/dept-veterans-affairs-believes-games-can-help-soldiers-reconnect-reduce-suicides-heres-how/
01:01:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Ash Paulsen
